輪.definition: wheel; disk; ring; steamship; to take turns; to rotate; classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

輪休.definition: to take holidays in rotation; to stagger employees' days off; (agriculture) to lie fallow in rotation

輪作.definition: rotation of crops (to preserve fertility of soil)

輪台.definition: Bügür nahiyisi or Luntai county in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture, Xinjiang 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州[Ba1 yin1 guo1 leng2 Meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

輪台古城.definition: ruins of Luntai city, archaeological site in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州, Xinjiang

輪台縣.definition: Bügür nahiyisi or Luntai county in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture, Xinjiang 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州[Ba1 yin1 guo1 leng2 Meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

輪回.definition: variant of 輪迴|轮回[lun2 hui2]

輪子.definition: wheel; (derog.) Falun Gong practitioner; CL:個|个[ge4]

輪崗.definition: to rotate jobs within an organization

輪廓鮮明.definition: sharp image; clear-cut; in bold outline; in sharp relief

輪指.definition: circular finger movement (in playing plucked instrument); strumming

輪替.definition: to take turns; to follow a rotating schedule

輪機.definition: turbine (abbr. for 渦輪機|涡轮机[wo1lun2ji1]); engine (of a ship)

輪次.definition: in turn; by turns; lap; turn; round; classifier for laps, turns, rounds

輪空.definition: (sports) bye; to get a bye; (of an employee) to be not scheduled at work for a period of time (when working shifts)

輪距.definition: tread (the distance between the two front – or two rear – wheels of a vehicle)

輪迴.definition: to reincarnate; reincarnation (Buddhism); (of the seasons etc) to follow each other cyclically; cycle; CL:個|个[ge4]

輪齒.definition: tooth of cog wheel; gear tooth
